title: E101: Ye acquires Parler, Snap drops 30%, macro outlook, VC metrics, valuing stocks & more
itunes:title: E101: Ye acquires Parler, Snap drops 30%, macro outlook, VC metrics, valuing stocks & more
description:
(0:00) Bestie intros: Brad Gerstner joins in place of Sacks, and brigadoons!

(2:02) Ye's current situation and acquisition of Parler

(14:17) Snap drops ~30%, corporate misgovernance, super-voting shares

(32:53) Macro outlook, Stability AI $101M fundraise, VC fund metrics

(1:05:38) The difficulty of active stock picking and valuing businesses

(1:21:38) Lyft vs Gavin Newsom on Prop 30, PSA from Chamath
